title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
content:
Privacy Policy Summary

We collect information to provide and improve JOYIN. This includes:

  • Information you provide: Profile data, content you create, messages you send
  • Automatically collected information: Device information, usage data, location (if enabled)
  • Information from others: Content others post about you

We use this information to:

  • Provide, personalize, and improve JOYIN
  • Promote safety and security
  • Communicate with you about JOYIN
  • Research and innovate for social good

Your Privacy Controls

You have control over your information:

  • Review and update your information in your profile
  • Download your information using our tools
  • Control visibility through privacy settings
  • Object to or restrict certain data processing

Terms of Service Highlights

By using JOYIN, you agree to:

  • Be at least 13 years old (or the minimum age in your country)
  • Not create multiple accounts for abusive purposes
  • Not sell, license, or purchase accounts or data
  • Not post unauthorized commercial communications
  • Not collect users' information without permission

Content Ownership

You own the content you create and share on JOYIN. You grant JOYIN a license to use that content to operate and improve our services. This license ends when you delete your content or account, unless the content has been shared with others.

Account Termination

We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate our terms or policies. You can deactivate or delete your account at any time through Settings > Account Management.

Full Documents: For complete legal documents, please refer to our full Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
